mapper.select: SELECT * FROM equipment order by create_time
SELECT * FROM equipment order by create_time LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM equipment order by create_time limit 6;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equipment (id, avatar_url, post_user_id, title, content, pictures_urls, is_delete, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{avatarUrl}, #{postUserId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{picturesUrls}, #{isDelete}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: UPDATE equipment SET post_user_id = #{post_user_id}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, pictures_urls = #{pictures_urls}, is_delete = #{is_delete}, update_time = #{update_time} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE equipment SET is_delete = true WHERE id = #{id}
